<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look in the list of free memory regions and use a block there if one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is available.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FreeMB.Free.allocatedSize() &gt;= RequiredSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uintptr&#95;t EndOfBlock = Addr + FreeMB.Free.allocatedSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Align the address.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Addr = (Addr + Alignment - 1) &amp; ~(uintptr&#95;t)(Alignment - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FreeMB.PendingPrefixIndex == (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)-1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The part of the block we&#39;re giving out to the user is now pending</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MemGroup.PendingMem.push&#95;back(sys::MemoryBlock((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;)Addr, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember this pending block, such that future allocations can just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// modify it rather than creating a new one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FreeMB.PendingPrefixIndex = MemGroup.PendingMem.size() - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">        sys::MemoryBlock &amp;PendingMB =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PendingMB = sys::MemoryBlock(PendingMB.base(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     Addr + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> - (uintptr&#95;t)PendingMB.base());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember how much free space is now left in this block</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">          sys::MemoryBlock((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;)(Addr + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>), EndOfBlock - Addr - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint8&#95;t &#42;)Addr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No pre-allocated free block was large enough. Allocate a new memory region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that all sections get allocated as read-write.  The permissions will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be updated later based on memory group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: It would be useful to define a default allocation size (or add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it as a constructor parameter) to minimize the number of allocations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// interleaving.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::error&#95;code ec;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MemGroup.Near = MB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// been initialized.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CodeMem.Near.base() == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CodeMem.Near = MB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RODataMem.Near.base() == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RODataMem.Near = MB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RWDataMem.Near.base() == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RWDataMem.Near = MB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember that we allocated this memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MemGroup.AllocatedMem.push&#95;back(MB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Addr = (uintptr&#95;t)MB.base();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uintptr&#95;t EndOfBlock = Addr + MB.allocatedSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Align the address.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Addr = (Addr + Alignment - 1) &amp; ~(uintptr&#95;t)(Alignment - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The part of the block we&#39;re giving out to the user is now pending</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MemGroup.PendingMem.push&#95;back(sys::MemoryBlock((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;)Addr, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The allocateMappedMemory may allocate much more memory than we need. In</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this case, we store the unused memory as a free memory block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FreeSize = EndOfBlock - Addr - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FreeSize &gt; 16) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FreeMemBlock FreeMB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FreeMB.Free = sys::MemoryBlock((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;)(Addr + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>), FreeSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FreeMB.PendingPrefixIndex = (unsigned)-1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MemGroup.FreeMem.push&#95;back(FreeMB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return aligned address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint8&#95;t &#42;)Addr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionmemorymanager/#af06d61d7c637095c5b7270b34224c5dd"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionmemorymanager/#af06d61d7c637095c5b7270b34224c5dd">SectionMemoryManager::finalizeMemory</a>(std::string &#42;ErrMsg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Should in-progress permissions be reverted if an error occurs?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::error&#95;code ec;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make code memory executable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ec = applyMemoryGroupPermissions(CodeMem,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memory/#a548f317b89dc0bba738b89e5ce791395a02cae455b05abf1bfb1de69095e66417">sys::Memory::MF&#95;READ</a> | <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memory/#a548f317b89dc0bba738b89e5ce791395a72200d7026f0978efe86fc34f4cba76e">sys::Memory::MF&#95;EXEC</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ec) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ErrMsg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#42;ErrMsg = ec.message();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make read-only data memory read-only.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ec = applyMemoryGroupPermissions(RODataMem, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memory/#a548f317b89dc0bba738b89e5ce791395a02cae455b05abf1bfb1de69095e66417">sys::Memory::MF&#95;READ</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ec) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ErrMsg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#42;ErrMsg = ec.message();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Read-write data memory already has the correct permissions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some platforms with separate data cache and instruction cache require</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// explicit cache flush, otherwise JIT code manipulations (like resolved</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// relocations) will get to the data cache but not to the instruction cache.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionmemorymanager/#a64835973f93c4f018aa377870e15ee97">invalidateInstructionCache</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a113f05f76ab4f04dc0d9d63c9d9962"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memoryblock">sys::MemoryBlock</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a113f05f76ab4f04dc0d9d63c9d9962">trimBlockToPageSize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memoryblock">sys::MemoryBlock</a> M) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#a90146d35673da9e3e4a7f41f3b8c9b7e">PageSize</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a774becf3d10728695b270703bca011ec">sys::Process::getPageSizeEstimate</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartOverlap =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#a90146d35673da9e3e4a7f41f3b8c9b7e">PageSize</a> - ((uintptr&#95;t)M.base() % <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#a90146d35673da9e3e4a7f41f3b8c9b7e">PageSize</a>)) % <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#a90146d35673da9e3e4a7f41f3b8c9b7e">PageSize</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TrimmedSize = M.allocatedSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TrimmedSize -= StartOverlap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TrimmedSize -= TrimmedSize % <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#a90146d35673da9e3e4a7f41f3b8c9b7e">PageSize</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memoryblock">sys::MemoryBlock</a> Trimmed((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;)((uintptr&#95;t)M.base() + StartOverlap),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           TrimmedSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(((uintptr&#95;t)Trimmed.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memoryblock/#a334b65a8b14eb0f90d3eb7c368ee07b2">base</a>() % <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#a90146d35673da9e3e4a7f41f3b8c9b7e">PageSize</a>) == 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Trimmed.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memoryblock/#a60a5600193f728ca1a0bcc9be953b158">allocatedSize</a>() % <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#a90146d35673da9e3e4a7f41f3b8c9b7e">PageSize</a>) == 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(M.base() &lt;= Trimmed.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memoryblock/#a334b65a8b14eb0f90d3eb7c368ee07b2">base</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">         Trimmed.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memoryblock/#a60a5600193f728ca1a0bcc9be953b158">allocatedSize</a>() &lt;= M.allocatedSize());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Trimmed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::error&#95;code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">SectionMemoryManager::applyMemoryGroupPermissions(MemoryGroup &amp;MemGroup,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Permissions) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (sys::MemoryBlock &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/mb">MB</a> : MemGroup.PendingMem)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::error&#95;code EC = MMapper-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionmemorymanager/memorymapper/#a1f7f6733e8af2f2911c2ff4832b5d693">protectMappedMemory</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/mb">MB</a>, Permissions))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MemGroup.PendingMem.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now go through free blocks and trim any of them that don&#39;t span the entire</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// page because one of the pending blocks may have overlapped it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FreeMemBlock &amp;FreeMB : MemGroup.FreeMem) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FreeMB.Free = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a113f05f76ab4f04dc0d9d63c9d9962">trimBlockToPageSize</a>(FreeMB.Free);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We cleared the PendingMem list, so all these pointers are now invalid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FreeMB.PendingPrefixIndex = (unsigned)-1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove all blocks which are now empty</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac9a7de5a04920954ac964059cfc428ad">erase&#95;if</a>(MemGroup.FreeMem, &#91;&#93;(FreeMemBlock &amp;FreeMB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    return FreeMB.Free.allocatedSize() == 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::error&#95;code();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionmemorymanager/#a64835973f93c4f018aa377870e15ee97"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionmemorymanager/#a64835973f93c4f018aa377870e15ee97">SectionMemoryManager::invalidateInstructionCache</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memory/#a5cfd4d2a8227a3f9ca0667f42f05f20b">sys::Memory::InvalidateInstructionCache</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.base(),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionmemorymanager/#a709a05abb7e82c5c8fefcc7ee16a3252"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionmemorymanager/#a709a05abb7e82c5c8fefcc7ee16a3252">SectionMemoryManager::~SectionMemoryManager</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MemoryGroup &#42;Group : &#123;&amp;CodeMem, &amp;RWDataMem, &amp;RODataMem&#125;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memoryblock">sys::MemoryBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> : Group-&gt;AllocatedMem)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MMapper-&gt;releaseMappedMemory(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionmemorymanager/memorymapper/#a4d89f052a2a35640380e0f5e13c770c8">SectionMemoryManager::MemoryMapper::~MemoryMapper</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"></CodeLine>
